name: European Industrial Pharmacists Group
membership: EIPG participates at meetings organised by the European Medicines Agency for Industry Stakeholders, including the meetings on Brexit, the annual meeting with Interested Parties of the GMP/GDP Inspectors Working Group of the EMA, and the EMA/HMA Task force on availability of authorised medicines.
memberOrga: The Member Organisations of EIPG can be found on the association's website at: http://eipg.eu/member-states/
goal: E.I.P.G. is a European association representing the national, professional organizations of pharmacists employed in the pharmaceutical or allied industries of the Member States of the European Union, the European Economic Area, or European countries having a mutual recognition agreement with the European Union on compliance control of regulated medicines.
interests: Competition, Consumers, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives: EIPG provides regular feedback to draft legislation and consultation documents issued by the European Commission, as well as feedback on guidelines, concept papers and reflection papers issued by the European Medicines Agency.
